706303f-a.text:
Poplar Street, west from and including Hicks Street, to Columbia Heights. Skyscrapers of lower Manhattan are seen in the background.  A, Rouleton chain store is seen at the S.W. corner of Hicks and Poplar Streets.
April 1, 1937
P.L. Sperr.
706303f-a.folder: Poplar Street & Hicks Street, Brooklyn, NY

704907f-a.text:
Hicks Street, east side, north from Poplar Street.
April 4, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
704907f-a.folder: Hicks Street & Poplar Street, Brooklyn, NY
